attributes.action: Keep the gyms open even during lockdown!
attributes.additional_details: Keep the nation healthy physically and mentally. Plus if schools are allowed open why aren't gyms as they cleaber and have greater safety measures.
attributes.background: Keep the gym open during lockdown. As exercise improves moods. Allows for daily exercise! It has also been shown to only contribute to less than 1% of all corona cases. Boris doesnt like facts thats why he is keeping the education sector open which is responsible for 49% of all covid cases.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign some of these petitions:

Keep gyms and leisure facilities open during any lockdown: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/556956

Prevent gyms closing due to a spike in Covid 19 cases: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/333869

The Committee will be holding a debate on Covid-19 restrictions on gyms and sport on Monday 23 November. You will be able to watch the debate on Parliament TV at 4.30pm: https://www.parliamentlive.tv/Commons
